statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd="$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')"; model="$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name')"; time="$(date +%H:%M:%S)"; if [ -d "$cwd/.git" ]; then branch="$(git -C "$cwd" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'detached')"; printf "\033[2m%s \033[36m%s\033[0m \033[32m[%s]\033[0m \033[33m%s\033[0m\n" "$time" "$model" "$branch" "$(basename "$cwd")"; else printf "\033[2m%s \033[36m%s\033[0m \033[33m%s\033[0m\n" "$time" "$model" "$(basename "$cwd")"; fi
